name: Fiddlemail
author: fiddlemail.com

sections.description: Disposable email addresses are temporary, throw-away addresses that expire after a short period of time. Our Fiddlemail API helps you to identify domains of fake email addresses and blocks them. All you need to start is a free API key from Fiddlemail.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the *.zip file and extract the /fiddlemail/ folder and the files.
  2. FTP program, upload to plugins directory (/wp-content/plugins).
  3. Register at fiddlemail.com to get a free API key.
  4. Go to plugins page and activate the plugin.
  5. Go to settings -> Fiddlemail and insert your API key.
sections.faq:
Is it free?

Yes! You can get a free API key for your website. For specific demands we offer a premium package.

Do you store email addresses?

No! The email addresses are not stored and discarded immediately after the query.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added support for Spamhaus dbl and URIBL
  • Added local whitelist and blacklist for domains
  • Added local cache for API results
  • Minor improvements

1.0.0

  • Initial release of the plugin

short_description: Identify and block disposable fake email addresses to prevent junk user registration and comments.
description: Disposable email addresses are temporary, throw-away addresses that expire after a short period of time. Our Fiddlemail API helps you to identify domains of fake email addresses and blocks them. All you need to start is a free API key from Fiddlemail.

upgrade_notice: Nothing to worry about. Should be straight forward. Just repeat the installation steps or install the plugin via Wordpress plugin marketplace.
